title: Spring Roll Bowl
ingredients: 1 head butterhead lettuce, torn into bite-sized pieces
2  green onions, sliced on a bias
1/2 cups mint leaves (or torn large leaves)
method: Step 2: Cook vermicelli noodles according to package directions. Run under cold water to cool. Divide noodles among four bowls.
Step 3: Add one fourth of the cooked shrimp to each bowl. On the side of the noodles arrange 1 cup of lettuce, 1/4  cup carrots, 1/4  cup cucumber, and 1/4  an avocado to each bowl.
Step 4: Meanwhile for Nam Chom combine rice vinegar, fish sauce, lime juice, ginger, and birds eye chile (optional) in a small bowl.
Step 5: For the peanut sauce combine peanut butter, coconut milk, hoisin sauce, lime juice, peanuts and sambal oelec in a small bowl; whisk until smooth.
Step 6: Top bowls with green onions, mint leaves and peanuts. Serve with peanut sauce and/or Nam Choc.
